## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f449ebddb88a3ed6afe114ead8e8e6c91b8127b7abb06ac7162a07d227cde5c1)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'maven-dependency-submission-action' @ 4.3.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
